_meta.description: Car Wars suspension types with physics engine mapping
notes: Cost is based on percentage of body cost
Suspension adds no weight and takes no space

physics_values.erp: Error Reduction Parameter (0-1) - higher = stiffer spring
physics_values.cfm: Constraint Force Mixing - lower = stiffer damping

light.name: Light Suspension
light.notes: Standard/default suspension. Soft, more body roll.

improved.name: Improved Suspension
improved.notes: Costs 100% of body cost. Balanced handling.

heavy.name: Heavy Suspension
heavy.notes: Costs 150% of body cost. Stiff, minimal body roll.

off_road.name: Off-Road Suspension
off_road.notes: Costs 500% of body cost. Very soft, long travel for rough terrain.

hd_shocks.name: Heavy-Duty Shocks
hd_shocks.notes: Reduces jump landing damage by 1 die
